channel.title: Growth on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Growth on COTTON

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GhAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Genome Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Root growth of GhAPX-overexpressing Arabidopsis subjected to abiotic stress.

item.title: GhARF17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A06G004210 Gene Symbol: GhARF17 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhARF18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A05G042500 Gene Symbol: GhARF18 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhBRC1 Gene Name: BRANCHED 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBRC1 has the same function as Arabidopsis BRC1 in repressing axillary bud development.

item.title: GhCERP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G2021 Gene Symbol: GhCERP Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Inter-species functional analysis of the BR-mediated BES1-CERP-EXPA3 signaling cascade also promotes Arabidopsis root and hypocotyl growth.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhEXPA1 Gene Name: alpha-expansin 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that GhRDL1 is localized in cell wall and interacts with GhEXPA1, an α-expansin functioning in wall loosening.

item.title: GhEXPA3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D04G1924 Gene Symbol: GhEXPA3-1 Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBES1 directly binds to E-box of GhCERP and regulates the transcription of GhCERP, which further binds to E-box of GhEXPA3-1 to enhance its transcription to promote plant cell elongation.

item.title: GhFIM2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhFIM2 Gene Name: fimbrin-2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GhFIM2 propels cotton fiber development by enhancing actin bundle formation.

item.title: GhGAI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G0717 Gene Symbol: GhGAI1 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhLPL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhLPL2 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhMKK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK3 Gene Name: Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 (GhMKK3) Functions in Drought Tolerance by Regulating Stomatal Responses and Root Growth.

item.title: GhMYB33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G2713 Gene Symbol: GhMYB33 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhPAO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPAO Gene Name: polyamine oxidase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton polyamine oxidase (GhPAO) is required for spermine and camalexin signalling in the defence response to Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhPIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPIP2|6 Gene Name: plasma membrane intrinsic protein 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhPIP2|6|3 interacted with GhPIP2|6|4 and GhPIP2|6|GhPIP2|6, but GhPIP2|6|GhPIP2|6 did not interact with GhPIP2|6|4.

item.title: GhRDL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhRDL1 Gene Name: dehydration-induced protein RD22-like protein1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that GhRDL1 is localized in cell wall and interacts with GhEXPA1, an α-expansin functioning in wall loosening.

item.title: GhSFT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A08G261500.1 Gene Symbol: GhSFT Gene Name: SINGLE FLOWER TRUSS Genome: G.

item.title: GhSFT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G252300.1 Gene Symbol: GhSFT Gene Name: SINGLE FLOWER TRUSS Genome: G.

item.title: GhSP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A07G120000.1 Gene Symbol: GhSP Gene Name: SELF-PRUNING Genome: G.

item.title: GhSP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D07G116400.1 Gene Symbol: GhSP Gene Name: SELF-PRUNING Genome: G.

item.title: GhTCE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G2316 Gene Symbol: GhTCE1 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhTCE1–GhTCEE1 dimers regulate transcriptional reprogramming during wound-induced callus formation in cotton Identify GhTCE1, a basic helix–loop–helix family transcription factor, and its interacting partners as a central regulatory module of early cell fate transition during in vitro dedifferentiation of cotton (Gossypium hirsutum).

item.title: GhTFL1-L1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gohir.A09G138800 Gene Symbol: GhTFL1-L1 Gene Name: TERMINAL FLOWER 1-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: We demonstrate that genes of the TERMINAL FLOWER 1 (TFL1)-like clade show different roles in regulating growth patterns.

item.title: GhTFL1-L1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gohir.D09G135900 Gene Symbol: GhTFL1-L1 Gene Name: TERMINAL FLOWER 1-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: We demonstrate that genes of the TERMINAL FLOWER 1 (TFL1)-like clade show different roles in regulating growth patterns.

item.title: GhTFL1-L2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gohir.D04G100700 Gene Symbol: GhTFL1-L2 Gene Name: TERMINAL FLOWER 1-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: We demonstrate that genes of the TERMINAL FLOWER 1 (TFL1)-like clade show different roles in regulating growth patterns.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GhUBC2L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G2323 Gene Symbol: GhUBC2L Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhUBP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G038500 Gene Symbol: GhUBP15 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GoSTR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D08G0109 Gene Symbol: GoSTR Gene Name: Gossypium Stem Trichome Repressor Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GoSTR, a negative modulator of stem trichome formation in cotton.
